name: Battle of The Momma's Boys
description:
"Battle Of The Mommas Boys" is a meme fighting game with no fighting. In this game no fancy punches, kicks, or combos need to be done. The only fighting done  is with "Yo Momma Jokes". Join Kanye and Dropout Bear against Drake and the OVO Owl in a battle for total supre-mom-cy to prove once and for all who is the best momma's boy.

Instructions

Choose either a "Yo Momma so fat", "Yo Momma so ugly", or "Yo Momma so Stupid" joke to try and make the opponent laugh by filling up their laugh meter. At the end of each play the funnier joke is said. If a player makes the opponent get two momma tokens then they win.

The hierachy of what jokes beat which is down below in the image
